language.entry: A twisted amalgamation of man and weapon, the Shrapnel delivers death from afar with the thunderous roar of her minigun. Clothed in her brigand uniform, she inspires fear into the hearts of men and do away with them when the time comes to fight.

Rapidly and ravenously, point the Shrapnel in the right direction and she will fill her foes with lead, dispensing devastating destruction with the barrage of her miniguns. Some say she has attained a great mental fortitude in battle which people instead quickly see a mad devil-may-care vixen.

A lone wolf abandoned by her pack, the Shrapnel thinks only of benefitting herself even at the cost of others. With the help - or unwilling cooperation - from an ally, the Shrapnel will be prepared to take on any fiendish horrors or mundane men.
The Townspeople are uneasy. This one is not here for their sake, and they know all too well she will eventually turn on them and claim all they have.
If you kill her i ban everyone in chat.
I must have his head, i am not ready to go !
Humanity is doomed either way. By your hands, or their own.
I got his head. Do what you will.
Where are you putting that rod?
Can't any of you do anything right?
All of you are as smart as a bag of nails.
What did they call it? Du je va?
Get your filthy hands away from me.
I won't fall for your tricks!
When I'm done, you'll have more holes than swiss cheese!
Blood will pour out of every hole you have.
One shot is all it takes.
What kind of armor is this supposed to be !
No no no, he's come back!
Ah, the recoil hurts... Give me more...
Go ahead, stand in front of me!
Ha! I have more important things to worry about.
They will all return to dust!
The lead will turn to gold.
Ah, the smell of gunsmoke in the air...
I still have uses for you.
Get your head out of the clouds!
I will live on to fight!
You're not going to take me to him!
He's behind me, he's behind me!
Haah... Will you cut even more?
I want to see how far I can go...
The pain makes me feel alive!
It's amazing how you manage to be THAT useless!
Don't you run away from the fight!
What's the use? He'll come back either way!
They're going to rip my gun away!
I'll die if I stay here!
I want more blood, theirs or mine...
The sweet kiss of a blade calls to me.
SAY HELLO TO MY BIG FRIEND!
Dancing in the night, my favourite past time!
I don't have time for this!
I'll die if I do that!
This must be the work of an enemy!
Show me where the body is!
You're trying to grab my prize!
What are we even doing here?
I don't like that look you're giving me!
I've learned to love the pain!
I'm going to have fun with you after this!
Why did we think we can succeed?
Look, look! I have arms again!
I'm not letting you steal my loot!
You're just going to mess me up!
I don't want to get rid of this feeling!
You must have been dropped as a child.
Do you have any idea who you're stealing from?!
Hit me with your best shot!
Why did you bring them here!
Let me give you some encouragement!
You and your friends are dead!
Better the enemy known than unkown!
Let us face our end together.
I NEED TO TAKE IT BACK!
I can get back my arms!
I don't want to be taken alive!
I swear it was on me!
I saw him right beside me!
I just want to get out!
Vvulf never made me do this!
There's some gas in the air making me lightheaded!
Criticize me, I deserve it.. I want it...
Hurt me both physically, and verbally.
I can't have my hands go dirty!
I did most of the work!
Is that how your father beat you?
I would compliment you if you weren't so weak.
You made a deal with them!
You're working for him aren't you?!
You're just waiting to take all the glory for yourself!
When we die you'll take everything won't you?!
There are shadowy hands all over the place!
Are we going the right way?
Why don't you aim for me next?
The iron jumps and goes back to the earth.
Three pence a week is what flying costs!
Torment is in front of me.
Do you have dung for brains?
I will shoot you if you don't stop!
Rising up before the cat is a grievous sin!
Unless it prolongs my pain, I don't want it.
The result would be the same.
It will have no effect on me.
I heard these will walk if you asked the hairy shrew!
You're going to make it worse!
How do I know you're not with them?!
Why would you deny me pleasure?
The pain helps me... It fills me...
That won't help me at all...
Fall down and hit the ceiling!
You're goading me into making a mistake!
I want my flesh to be soft!
It will only make it harder to feel the pain.
I want the full experience of agony.
A cougar once kicked my brother in the ass and blinded him!
The traps live in the river Styx!
Don't remind me of the pain, please!
It was part of the job! But i loved every second of it!
The townspeople... I can hear them! I'll have their heads!

A twisted amalgamation of man and weapon, the Shrapnel delivers death from afar with the thunderous roar of her minigun. Clothed in her brigand uniform, she inspires fear into the hearts of men and do away with them when the time comes to fight.

Rapidly and ravenously, point the Shrapnel in the right direction and she will fill her foes with lead, dispensing devastating destruction with the barrage of her miniguns. Some say she has attained a great mental fortitude in battle which people instead quickly see a mad devil-may-care vixen.

A lone wolf abandoned by her pack, the Shrapnel thinks only of benefitting herself even at the cost of others. With the help - or unwilling cooperation - from an ally, the Shrapnel will be prepared to take on any fiendish horrors or mundane men.
The Townspeople are uneasy. This one is not here for their sake, and they know all too well she will eventually turn on them and claim all they have.
I must have his head, i am not ready to go !
Humanity is doomed either way. By your hands, or their own.
I got his head. Do what you will.
Where are you putting that rod?
Can't any of you do anything right?
All of you are as smart as a bag of nails.
What did they call it? Du je va?
Get your filthy hands away from me.
I won't fall for your tricks!
When I'm done, you'll have more holes than swiss cheese!
Blood will pour out of every hole you have.
One shot is all it takes.
What kind of armor is this supposed to be !
No no no, he's come back!
Ah, the recoil hurts... Give me more...
Go ahead, stand in front of me!
Ha! I have more important things to worry about.
They will all return to dust!
The lead will turn to gold.
Ah, the smell of gunsmoke in the air...
I still have uses for you.
Get your head out of the clouds!
I will live on to fight!
You're not going to take me to him!
He's behind me, he's behind me!
Haah... Will you cut even more?
I want to see how far I can go...
The pain makes me feel alive!
It's amazing how you manage to be THAT useless!
Don't you run away from the fight!
What's the use? He'll come back either way!
They're going to rip my gun away!
I'll die if I stay here!
I want more blood, theirs or mine...
The sweet kiss of a blade calls to me.
SAY HELLO TO MY BIG FRIEND!
Dancing in the night, my favourite past time!
I don't have time for this!
I'll die if I do that!
This must be the work of an enemy!
Show me where the body is!
You're trying to grab my prize!
What are we even doing here?
I don't like that look you're giving me!
I've learned to love the pain!
I'm going to have fun with you after this!
Why did we think we can succeed?
Look, look! I have arms again!
I'm not letting you steal my loot!
You're just going to mess me up!
I don't want to get rid of this feeling!
You must have been dropped as a child.
Do you have any idea who you're stealing from?!
Hit me with your best shot!
Why did you bring them here!
Let me give you some encouragement!
You and your friends are dead!
Better the enemy known than unkown!
Let us face our end together.
I NEED TO TAKE IT BACK!
I can get back my arms!
I don't want to be taken alive!
I swear it was on me!
I saw him right beside me!
I just want to get out!
Vvulf never made me do this!
There's some gas in the air making me lightheaded!
Criticize me, I deserve it.. I want it...
Hurt me both physically, and verbally.
I can't have my hands go dirty!
I did most of the work!
Is that how your father beat you?
I would compliment you if you weren't so weak.
You made a deal with them!
You're working for him aren't you?!
You're just waiting to take all the glory for yourself!
When we die you'll take everything won't you?!
There are shadowy hands all over the place!
Are we going the right way?
Why don't you aim for me next?
The iron jumps and goes back to the earth.
Three pence a week is what flying costs!
Torment is in front of me.
Do you have dung for brains?
I will shoot you if you don't stop!
Rising up before the cat is a grievous sin!
Unless it prolongs my pain, I don't want it.
The result would be the same.
It will have no effect on me.
I heard these will walk if you asked the hairy shrew!

Why would you deny me pleasure?

You're just waiting to take all the glory for yourself!
When we die you'll take everything won't you?!
There are shadowy hands all over the place!
Are we going the right way?
Why don't you aim for me next?
The iron jumps and goes back to the earth.
Three pence a week is what flying costs!
Torment is in front of me.
Do you have dung for brains?
I will shoot you if you don't stop!
Rising up before the cat is a grievous sin!
Unless it prolongs my pain, I don't want it.
The result would be the same.
It will have no effect on me.
I heard these will walk if you asked the hairy shrew!
You're going to make it worse!
How do I know you're not with them?!
Why would you deny me pleasure?
The pain helps me... It fills me...
That won't help me at all...
Fall down and hit the ceiling!
You're goading me into making a mistake!
I want my flesh to be soft!
It will only make it harder to feel the pain.
I want the full experience of agony.
A cougar once kicked my brother in the ass and blinded him!
The traps live in the river Styx!
Don't remind me of the pain, please!
It was part of the job! But i loved every second of it!
The townspeople... I can hear them! I'll have their heads!

A twisted amalgamation of man and weapon, the Shrapnel delivers death from afar with the thunderous roar of her minigun. Clothed in her brigand uniform, she inspires fear into the hearts of men and do away with them when the time comes to fight.

Rapidly and ravenously, point the Shrapnel in the right direction and she will fill her foes with lead, dispensing devastating destruction with the barrage of her miniguns. Some say she has attained a great mental fortitude in battle which people instead quickly see a mad devil-may-care vixen.

A lone wolf abandoned by her pack, the Shrapnel thinks only of benefitting herself even at the cost of others. With the help - or unwilling cooperation - from an ally, the Shrapnel will be prepared to take on any fiendish horrors or mundane men.
The Townspeople are uneasy. This one is not here for their sake, and they know all too well she will eventually turn on them and claim all they have.
I must have his head, i am not ready to go !
Humanity is doomed either way. By your hands, or their own.
I got his head. Do what you will.
Where are you putting that rod?
Can't any of you do anything right?
All of you are as smart as a bag of nails.
What did they call it? Du je va?
Get your filthy hands away from me.
I won't fall for your tricks!
When I'm done, you'll have more holes than swiss cheese!
Blood will pour out of every hole you have.
One shot is all it takes.
What kind of armor is this supposed to be !
No no no, he's come back!
Ah, the recoil hurts... Give me more...
Go ahead, stand in front of me!
Ha! I have more important things to worry about.
They will all return to dust!
The lead will turn to gold.
Ah, the smell of gunsmoke in the air...
I still have uses for you.
Get your head out of the clouds!
I will live on to fight!
You're not going to take me to him!
He's behind me, he's behind me!
Haah... Will you cut even more?
I want to see how far I can go...
The pain makes me feel alive!
It's amazing how you manage to be THAT useless!
Don't you run away from the fight!
What's the use? He'll come back either way!
They're going to rip my gun away!
I'll die if I stay here!
I want more blood, theirs or mine...
The sweet kiss of a blade calls to me.
SAY HELLO TO MY BIG FRIEND!
Dancing in the night, my favourite past time!
I don't have time for this!
I'll die if I do that!
This must be the work of an enemy!
Show me where the body is!
You're trying to grab my prize!
What are we even doing here?
I don't like that look you're giving me!
I've learned to love the pain!
I'm going to have fun with you after this!
Why did we think we can succeed?
Look, look! I have arms again!
I'm not letting you steal my loot!
You're just going to mess me up!
I don't want to get rid of this feeling!
You must have been dropped as a child.
Do you have any idea who you're stealing from?!
Hit me with your best shot!
Why did you bring them here!
Let me give you some encouragement!
You and your friends are dead!
Better the enemy known than unkown!
Let us face our end together.
I NEED TO TAKE IT BACK!
I can get back my arms!
I don't want to be taken alive!
I swear it was on me!
I saw him right beside me!
I just want to get out!
Vvulf never made me do this!
There's some gas in the air making me lightheaded!
Criticize me, I deserve it.. I want it...
Hurt me both physically, and verbally.
I can't have my hands go dirty!
I did most of the work!
Is that how your father beat you?
I would compliment you if you weren't so weak.

You're trying to grab my prize!
What are we even doing here?
I don't like that look you're giving me!
I've learned to love the pain!
I'm going to have fun with you after this!
Why did we think we can succeed?
Look, look! I have arms again!
I'm not letting you steal my loot!
You're just going to mess me up!
I don't want to get rid of this feeling!
You must have been dropped as a child.
Do you have any idea who you're stealing from?!
Hit me with your best shot!
Why did you bring them here!
Let me give you some encouragement!
You and your friends are dead!
Better the enemy known than unkown!
Let us face our end together.
I NEED TO TAKE IT BACK!
I can get back my arms!
I don't want to be taken alive!
I swear it was on me!
I saw him right beside me!
I just want to get out!
Vvulf never made me do this!
There's some gas in the air making me lightheaded!
Criticize me, I deserve it.. I want it...
Hurt me both physically, and verbally.
I can't have my hands go dirty!
I did most of the work!
Is that how your father beat you?
I would compliment you if you weren't so weak.
You made a deal with them!
You're working for him aren't you?!
You're just waiting to take all the glory for yourself!
When we die you'll take everything won't you?!
There are shadowy hands all over the place!
Are we going the right way?
Why don't you aim for me next?
The iron jumps and goes back to the earth.
Three pence a week is what flying costs!
Torment is in front of me.
Do you have dung for brains?
I will shoot you if you don't stop!
Rising up before the cat is a grievous sin!
Unless it prolongs my pain, I don't want it.
The result would be the same.
It will have no effect on me.
I heard these will walk if you asked the hairy shrew!
You're going to make it worse!
How do I know you're not with them?!
Why would you deny me pleasure?
The pain helps me... It fills me...
That won't help me at all...
Fall down and hit the ceiling!
You're goading me into making a mistake!
I want my flesh to be soft!
It will only make it harder to feel the pain.
I want the full experience of agony.
A cougar once kicked my brother in the ass and blinded him!
The traps live in the river Styx!
Don't remind me of the pain, please!
It was part of the job! But i loved every second of it!
The townspeople... I can hear them! I'll have their heads!

A twisted amalgamation of man and weapon, the Shrapnel delivers death from afar with the thunderous roar of her minigun. Clothed in her brigand uniform, she inspires fear into the hearts of men and do away with them when the time comes to fight.

Rapidly and ravenously, point the Shrapnel in the right direction and she will fill her foes with lead, dispensing devastating destruction with the barrage of her miniguns. Some say she has attained a great mental fortitude in battle which people instead quickly see a mad devil-may-care vixen.

A lone wolf abandoned by her pack, the Shrapnel thinks only of benefitting herself even at the cost of others. With the help - or unwilling cooperation - from an ally, the Shrapnel will be prepared to take on any fiendish horrors or mundane men.
The Townspeople are uneasy. This one is not here for their sake, and they know all too well she will eventually turn on them and claim all they have.
I must have his head, i am not ready to go !
Humanity is doomed either way. By your hands, or their own.
I got his head. Do what you will.
Where are you putting that rod?
Can't any of you do anything right?
All of you are as smart as a bag of nails.
What did they call it? Du je va?
Get your filthy hands away from me.
I won't fall for your tricks!
When I'm done, you'll have more holes than swiss cheese!
Blood will pour out of every hole you have.
One shot is all it takes.
What kind of armor is this supposed to be !
No no no, he's come back!
Ah, the recoil hurts... Give me more...
Go ahead, stand in front of me!
Ha! I have more important things to worry about.
They will all return to dust!
The lead will turn to gold.
Ah, the smell of gunsmoke in the air...
I still have uses for you.
Get your head out of the clouds!
I will live on to fight!
You're not going to take me to him!
He's behind me, he's behind me!
Haah... Will you cut even more?
I want to see how far I can go...
The pain makes me feel alive!
It's amazing how you manage to be THAT useless!
Don't you run away from the fight!
What's the use? He'll come back either way!
They're going to rip my gun away!
I'll die if I stay here!
I want more blood, theirs or mine...
The sweet kiss of a blade calls to me.
SAY HELLO TO MY BIG FRIEND!
Dancing in the night, my favourite past time!
I don't have time for this!
I'll die if I do that!
